The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Velez Malaga, Malaga, Andalucia

Katherine Dau

Verified

Photo from Wikimedia Commons

Vélez Málaga sits on two hills. A medieval fortress occupies one and the chapel of Our Lady of los Remedios the other. The structure was built in the 17th century.

Works cited

  1. “Vélez Málaga”, Wikipedia.
  2. “Ermita de la Virgen de los Remedios (Vélez-Málaga),” Wikipedia
  3. “Historia del Templo,” Turismo Velez-Malaga
